text: Dorlar is a locality in the municipality Schmallenberg in the district Hochsauerlandkreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The village has 879 inhabitantsSchmallenberg.de: Inhabitants and lies in the north of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 340 m. In the village centre the Bundesstraße 236 federal road meets the Kreisstraße 20. Dorlar borders on the villages of Frielinghausen, Nierentrop, Kirchilpe, Twismecke, Sellinghausen, Mailar, Grimminghausen, Menkhausen and Berghof. == Gallery == File:Raum Schmallenberg, Auszug aus Blaeu 1645 - Westphalia Ducatus.jpg| „Dorler“ 1645 - Westphalia Ducatus (Duchy of Westphalia) File:Schmallenberg- Dorlar, Kirche St. Hubertus.jpg|Dorlar, St. Hubertus == External links == *Dorlar-hsk.de ==References== Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Schmallenberg
title: Dorlar
